subdisciplines.name: Screenwriting
subdisciplines.description: The art and craft of writing scripts for film, television, and other forms of visual media.

subdisciplines.name: Cinematography
subdisciplines.description: The art and technique of capturing images on camera for use in filmmaking.

subdisciplines.name: Editing
subdisciplines.description: The process of selecting and arranging shots in a sequence, often using specialized software.

subdisciplines.name: Sound design
subdisciplines.description: The creation and manipulation of audio elements, including music and sound effects, used in film and other media.
